data.message: Why won't my feed stay at Most recent where I want it!!?

replies.message: Hi Tessa. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2pVgTgY. -Jessica
Yes! MOST RECENT. Make it work as it should in chronological order.
Based on all of these posts, I'd say you wasted your money on your "research".
